Name: web3-sample-app
YAMLDocument:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  name: sample-app
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: web3-sample-app-config
  namespace: sample-app
data:
  VITE_RPCENDPOINT: http://forward-proxy.forward-proxy-system.svc.cluster.local
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: web3-sample-app
  namespace: sample-app
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web3-sample
  replicas: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web3-sample
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: web3-sample-app
          image: ghcr.io/qleet/web3-sample-app:v0.0.14
          imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
          env:
            - name: PORT
              value: '8080'
            - name: VITE_RPCENDPOINT
              valueFrom:
                configMapKeyRef:
                  name: web3-sample-app-config
                  key: VITE_RPCENDPOINT
          ports:
            - containerPort: 8080
      restartPolicy: Always
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: web3-sample-app
  namespace: sample-app
spec:
  selector:
    app: web3-sample
  ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
      targetPort: 8080
